ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Light weight implementation of the standard distribution functions for the inverse gamma distribution, wrapping those for the gamma distribution in the stats package.
Light weight implementation of the standard distribution functions for the inverse gamma distribution, wrapping those for the gamma distribution in the stats package.

name: r-invgamma
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-invgamma
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/invgamma_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/invgamma/invgamma_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f74229bad5f14cadb4e0b1acc85072a08dc8b6de1b93f1384fcb6c448ad56601

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('invgamma')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('invgamma')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/dkahle/invgamma
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Light weight implementation of the standard distribution functions for the inverse gamma distribution, wrapping those for the gamma distribution in the stats package.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: invgamma
# Type: Package
# Title: The Inverse Gamma Distribution
# Version: 1.1
# URL: https://github.com/dkahle/invgamma
# BugReports: https://github.com/dkahle/invgamma/issues
# Authors@R: c( person("David", "Kahle", email = "david.kahle@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre", "cph")), person("James", "Stamey", email = "james_stamey@baylor.edu", role = c("aut", "cph")) )
# Description: Light weight implementation of the standard distribution functions for the inverse gamma distribution, wrapping those for the gamma distribution in the stats package.
# License: GPL-2
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2017-05-07 03:26:36 UTC; david_kahle
# Author: David Kahle [aut, cre, cph], James Stamey [aut, cph]
# Maintainer: David Kahle <david.kahle@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2017-05-07 05:22:52 UTC
